aws_encryption_sdk.internal.formatting.deserializeÂ¶

Components for handling AWS Encryption SDK message deserialization.

Functions

deserialize_footer(stream[, verifier]) Deserializes a footer.
deserialize_frame(stream, header[, verifier]) Deserializes a frame from a body.
deserialize_header(stream) Deserializes the header from a source stream

deserialize_wrapped_key(wrapping_algorithm, â¦) Extracts and deserializes EncryptedData from a Wrapped EncryptedDataKey.

update_verifier_with_tag(stream, header, â¦) Updates verifier with data for authentication tag.
validate_header(header, header_auth, â¦) Validates the header using the header authentication data.
aws_encryption_sdk.internal.formatting.deserialize.validate_header(header, header_auth, raw_header, data_key)Â¶

Validates the header using the header authentication data.

Parameters:
  • header (aws_encryption_sdk.structures.MessageHeader) â Deserialized header
  • header_auth (aws_encryption_sdk.internal.structures.MessageHeaderAuthentication) â Deserialized header auth
  • raw_header (bytes) â Raw header bytes
  • data_key (bytes) â Data key with which to perform validation
Raises:

SerializationError â if header authorization fails
aws_encryption_sdk.internal.formatting.deserialize.deserialize_header(stream)Â¶

Deserializes the header from a source stream

Parameters:

stream (io.BytesIO) â Source data stream
Returns:

Deserialized MessageHeader object
Return type:

aws_encryption_sdk.structures.MessageHeader and bytes
Raises:
  • NotSupportedError â if unsupported data types are found
  • UnknownIdentityError â if unknown data types are found
  • SerializationError â if IV length does not match algorithm

aws_encryption_sdk.internal.formatting.deserialize.update_verifier_with_tag(stream, header, verifier)Â¶

Updates verifier with data for authentication tag.

Note

This is meant to be used in conjunction with deserialize_non_framed_values to update the verifier over information which has already been retrieved.

Parameters:
  • stream (io.BytesIO) â Source data stream
  • header (aws_encryption_sdk.structures.MessageHeader) â Deserialized header
  • verifier (aws_encryption_sdk.internal.crypto.Verifier) â Signature verifier object
Returns:

Return type:

bytes

aws_encryption_sdk.internal.formatting.deserialize.deserialize_wrapped_key(wrapping_algorithm, wrapping_key_id, wrapped_encrypted_key)Â¶

Extracts and deserializes EncryptedData from a Wrapped EncryptedDataKey.

Parameters:
  • wrapping_algorithm (aws_encryption_sdk.identifiers.WrappingAlgorithm) â Wrapping Algorithm with which to wrap plaintext_data_key
  • wrapping_key_id (bytes) â Key ID of wrapping MasterKey
  • wrapped_encrypted_key (aws_encryption_sdk.structures.EncryptedDataKey) â Raw Wrapped EncryptedKey
Returns:

EncryptedData of deserialized Wrapped EncryptedKey
Return type:

aws_encryption_sdk.internal.structures.EncryptedData
Raises:
  • SerializationError â if wrapping_key_id does not match deserialized wrapping key id
  • SerializationError â if wrapping_algorithm IV length does not match deserialized IV length
